DOC.brief_summary: This phase 3 , open-label , multiple-center , non-randomized single dose study assess safety efficacy [ 123I ] NAV5001 SPECT image aid differentiaion parkinsonian syndromes non-parkinsonian tremor .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Diagnostic Efficacy Safety 123INAV5001 Imaging Agent Aid Diagnosis Parkinsonian Syndromes
DOC.criteria: Subject provide write informed consent initiation study related procedure continue give willing consent participation Age ≥ 40 year Have upper extremity tremor < 3 year duration , regardless presume diagnosis etiology Have UPDRS part III score upon entry ≤ 16 Any clinically significant unstable physical psychological illness base medical history physical examination screening , determine investigator Structural brain abnormality affect entire brain ( e.g. , normal pressure hydrocephalus ) striatum ( e.g. , local tumor stroke ) Any clinically significant abnormal laboratory result obtain screen determined investigator Any clinically significant abnormal electrocardiogram ( ECG ) result obtain screen determined investigator Any history drug , narcotic , alcohol abuse within 2 year date inform consent , define Diagnostic Statistical Manual American Psychiatric Association , Fourth Edition , revise ( DSMIVTR [ American Psychiatric Association , 1994 ] ) Positive urine drug screen opiate , cocaine , amphetamine screen Positive pregnancy test image Participation investigational drug device clinical trial within 30 day date inform consent Previous scan DAT imaging agent ( e.g . [ 123I ] NAV5001 , Altropane , DaTscan , DOPASCAN ) Any exposure radiopharmaceutical within 30 day date inform consent Breastfeeding Inability lie supine 1 hour Any thyroid disease adequately treat hypothyroidism Known sensitivity allergy iodine iodine contain product Treatment within 30 day date imaging amoxapine , amphetamine , benztropine , bupropion , buspirone , cocaine , mazindol , methamphetamine , methylphenidate , norephedrine , phentermine , phenylpropanolamine , selegiline , sertraline , paroxetine , citalopram .
